We have reason to believe that one of our employees is planning to sell company info to a competitor. We don't know who it is,
but we would prefer to be on the safe side. Please check through user folders and see if you can find anything.
If you find any relevant text, put it below.

malware becoming much more effective and arguments over whether governments should be given special
backdoors into computer operating systems. What was the name of this leak?
